```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
int_names <- c("unison", "major second", "major third", "perfect fourth", "perfect fifth", 
             "major sixth", "major seventh", "octave")
int_ratios <- c(1, 9/8, 5/4, 4/3, 3/2, 5/3, 15/8, 2)

tonic <- sample(100:1000, 1)
i <- sample(2:8, 1)

ans <- signif(tonic * int_ratios[i], 3)

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, delta = ans/10, format = FALSE, digits = 6)
sc$questions <- sprintf("%g Hz", signif(sc$questions, 3))
```

Question
========
What frequency is a `r int_names[i]` above `r tonic` Hz?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
The frequency is

$$ (`r int_ratios[i]`)(`r tonic` \,\mathsf{Hz}) = `r ans` \,\mathsf{Hz} $$
